Left 4 Dead è stato il mio primo gioco in tutta la mia vita è dal 2016 che ho questo gioco io l'account comunque lo creato nel 2016 dico davvero questo gioco mi piace tantissimo è un gioco con  gli zombie, è divertente, fa ridere, è cartonesco un po meno di Team Fortress 2, ma  Left 4 Dead è bellissimo perchè è stato il mio primo gioco di tutta la mia vita lo gia detto ma per ridirlo perchè se velo dimenticate non so che potrebbe succedere ma vabbe torniamo al gioco consiglio questo gioco a chi lo vuole comprare soprattutto perchè è bello, mi piace, è cartonesco, e lo desideravo da danto.
Spero che questa recensione su Left 4 Dead vi sia piaciuta comunque compratelo, divertitevi con gli amici. 
Se volete potete attivare la console e divertirvi con il sv_cheats 1 con divertenti trucchi da usare per divertirsi con gli amici quanto volete se volete giocarlo con il controller c'è il supporto per il controller io non lo ancora testato con il controller ma comunque consiglio questo gioco.
Spero che la recensione vi sia stata utile.
Divertitevi.

Also played it a lot outside Steam and it's a really great game :) With a group of friends (up to 8) it's one of the best games, along with the sequel, for a few hours of fun. It can also get really intense, especially the first few times, when you are suddenly swarmed by zombies or assaulted out of nowhere! A lot of fun :)

If I should mention one big problem with the game, it's that when you aren't playing 4 co-op, the AI that controls the remaining survivors are stupid as hell. It can stand in a room with zombies, but unless the zombies attack the survivors or the real players shoot at it, it will just ignore the zombies. The AI never picks up or use bombs or molotovcocktails. It never uses the machine guns. You can't really tactical plan with it. And it is even worse. I just lost an AI driven survivor because it stood in the middle of a fire and never moved out of it. Just kept getting revived and kept standing in the flames... No self-preservation. I mean, that's just lousy programming. It does in fact make single-player a whole lot more difficult because you can only expect limited backup and always have to go first into any situation. A better AI and an order-system, like in Star Wars Republic Commandos, would definitely improve the game-play for play modes for less than 4 players.

I absolutely love the half life series and all the games, I recommend every single one of the games but am extremely disappointed in valve. The complete lack of ANY communication for TEN YEARS is completly disgusting, It is disrepectful to the fans who supported valve for years. Its sad that valve doesnt even have the courtesy to tell their fans that half life is dead. It is clear that we will never get a satisfying ending to an amazing story. I personally am not interested in anything valve has released since Episode 2, and if the single player story driven masterpieces of recent years are anything to go by, its that valve only cares about its games as service titles, and not their narative driven campaigns. I am deeply upset that we will never get to explore the atmospheric and exciting universe of half life again. Valve prides themselves on their independance and flat workplace structure, but its clear there is a lack of focus. Valve, like too many companies in the video games industry, seem to be too blinded on following the money, they have left behind those that got them there in the first place...

EDIT: Sometimes you will feel abandoned
while trying to find a game. Checking online campaign,
versus or survival. You'll see empty wall. and also
you will see 500 players or more as online. In this case
you need to open Developer Console.
To Enable Developer Console,
Enter Options Menu > Click Keyboard&Mouse Options
You'll find it there. When you enabled Developer Console
you need to type this to developer console.
" openserverbrowser " Yup. That's It. You'll see huge
entire server lists. You can join a server from there.
Third party servers mostly but sure you'll have fun.
Have Good Game!

Me considero un fan de este grandioso juego, su estrategia es bastante bueno, la posibilidad de una partida colaborativa para varios jugadores, permiten que cada jugador se sienta respaldado y se puedan crear estrategias de avance y protección de los miembros del equipo, sus distintas campañas tienen un contenido que cada vez que se juega se descubran nuevos elementos o alternativas de enfrentamientos, en esta primera entrega se empieza a descifrar la trama y la historia de este caos zombie, sus alternativas como enfrentamiento permiten que un buen numero de jugadores se reúnan tanto el equipo de sobrevivientes como el equipo de infectados, el modo sobreviviente cada vez mas interesante ya que estarás dispuesto a romper tu marca de sobre vivencia, en fin muy recomendado de 5 estrellas tiene 5.

Да что тут можно ещё сказать? Игра - лучший кооперативный шутер, для игры с друзяшками под пивасик. Продуманые и интересные локации, ситуации, которые возникают, в ходе игры, персонажы, которые уже как родные и взаимовыручка товарищей - всё это бесценно. 10 из 10, ХОСПАДЕ, 10 из 10!!!
P.S. В это игре у протагониста видны НОГИ! НОГИ, БЛЯ! Для 2017 года - давно утерянные технологии.

Zombie Apocalypse brought to video gaming. Perfect in every way imaginable except for the solo content. Left 4 Dead is meant to be played with friends or online multiplayer where you can come up with strategies on how to tackle the mission. If you play by yourself, you're going to have a rough time on harder difficulties as your computer controlled companions lack creative thinking.

有一天，无意间主页给我推荐了这个游戏，脑海中的记忆如潮水般袭来。
记得刚刚升入初中的时候，我陪着新学期的同学出去玩，我们兜兜转转来到了cbd的一个桌游吧。大厅是一排的xbox以及炫酷的手柄。那个时候连手机这些科技产品，我都用的是弱基亚，还很高心，so纯洁的我哪晓得这些是什么咚咚，乡下来的熊孩子被城里的骚东西亮瞎眼了。我和一个朋友来到一台机前。吧台的小姐姐为我们送来了一叠光盘，让我们自己选，我看到第一张就是LEFT4DEAD2。我们决定一张张通关（太年轻了），那个时候我电脑都不怎么玩得转，换作用手柄玩一个FPS的快节奏的游戏，，，简直就是花样作死，不停的die。die。die。。第一张图公寓，我们进入公寓后，那个下午就再也没有出去过了，再也没有（我到现在还记得当年被某个特殊感染者二话不说一头撞下楼层的壮烈场景，我看着我们俩的尸体在空中翻滚，恐惧支配。。。我们笑着互相说对方好坑，思路都不对啥的。即使游戏体验相当差（现在感觉也没有比那次更差的），但我们真的很开心，很开心，团灭就重新再来，一遍，又一遍。
就从那天开始，只要我们放假总会约来打求生，和一些其他的经典单机，比如光晕，孤岛等，我也从刚刚开始不停扑街，到最后比较熟练会用手柄的一些按键了。岁月如梭，7年咣当就过去了，我们去了不同的城市，国家。我中考很惨烈（那个时候我学习本来就烂，高考也就那样）。大家都考得很好（起码比我好），我开始渐渐在群里潜水。最让我记忆犹新的事是在中考前夕，我和那位经常和我打求生的很好的朋友吵架了。说起来是我的错，可是呀我真是死要面子，道歉真的说不出口，渐渐就形同陌路。直到他去澳洲了，我一个信息都没有发过去。
   上高中后，我偶尔会独自过去，一个人坐在屏幕前，开一杯喝的，默默地用手柄玩着一代，最后通关。我看看窗外，想起当年我们很多人坐在这里，聊着有的，没的，现在以及未来。
   高考完后的暑假，我创建了steam账号，浏览商店时，无意间找到了这款游戏，惊喜间并果断地买了下来。下载，打开，我看着开场动画，仿佛又回到了多年前，一切历历在目。因为这款游戏，我认识了一位知心益友。我明白了友谊的难能可贵，我也非常后悔自己当年愚蠢的行为。可惜没有如果，一切都过去了，现在我想再去说一声对不起，却没有机会了。
   廖一梅曾说过“每个人都很孤独。在我们的一生中，遇到爱，遇到性，都不稀罕，稀罕的是遇到了解。”（咳咳，其实遇到X还是很稀罕的，尤其是对我这种死肥宅来说）
   还想说什么，却不知如何下笔，脑子乱糟糟的。
   最后还是借用老薛的一句“爱我的人，谢谢你”

[h1]Details[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]A team-based counter-strike clone that encourages strong team-work and has a great atmsphere.[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1795689887
Select your hero from a cast of generic stereotypes and work as a team to survive missions. Each mission has goals, checkpoints and waves of zombies, including witches, fat-zombies and ranged-zombies. A run-and-gun survival classic with some nice quirks. Teh sequel effectively contains all of the content of the original - so you can play the sequle without feeling you have missed too much - except the Steam achievements of course. A great multi-player experience nontheless.

[/quote]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]No brainer! It is a real hoot to play, a glorious one-trick pony but with some surprising depths and tactics required.[/h1]
Pros:
- lots of zombie killing
- lots of zombie killing
- plays like a VHS movie
- lots of zombie killing
- achievements

Cons:
- superceded by sequel - you don't need this version.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1748238549 
[/quote]
